doc:
Drea de Matteo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drea_de_Matteo 0 Andrea Donna de Matteo (; born January 19, 1972) is an American actress, known for her roles as Angie Bolen on ABC's Desperate Housewives, Joey Tribbiani's sister Gina on the NBC sitcom Joey, Wendy Case on FX series Sons of Anarchy, and Adriana La Cerva on the HBO drama series The Sopranos, a role for which she won a Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actress in a Drama Series. She played Det. Tess Nazario in NBC's Shades of Blue. Andrea_Donna de Matteo ( ; born January_19_,_1972 ) is an_American_actress , known for her_roles as Angie_Bolen on ABC 's_Desperate_Housewives , Joey_Tribbiani 's_sister_Gina on the_NBC_sitcom_Joey , Wendy_Case on FX_series_Sons of Anarchy , and Adriana_La_Cerva on the_HBO_drama_series The_Sopranos , a_role for which she won a_Primetime_Emmy_Award for Outstanding_Supporting_Actress in a_Drama_Series . She played Det._Tess_Nazario in NBC 's_Shades of Blue .
